Description.name: Description0
Description.content:
Contains resources of used frameworks/libraries

  • Bootstrap
  • Boostrap paginator plugin
  • JQuery
  • JQuery-UI
  • Unify Bootstrap theme

Description.name: Description0
Description.content:
Contains

  • Resource type definitions
  • Schema files
  • Localization files for schemas
  • Element views

Description.name: Description0
Description.content:
Contains

  • Formatters (for all contents of the module com.alkacon.bootstrap.schemas)
  • Templates
  • Template resources
  • Dynamic functions
  • Localization for formatters

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Two additional resource types (a-imagegallery and a-sliderextended) with schemas and formatters

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The content of the demo website. This module has no module folder - it only contains the contents under /sites/default/ (except the .formatters/ folder, which comes with the formatters module). The content module also adds some users with different roles.
